content: There is an issue with the verso pages not rendering properly at https://github.com/teorth/analysis/issues/347, since it's still persisting I hope it's fine if I cross-post here (e.g. https://teorth.github.io/analysis/sec21/)
I will look in the morning - thanks for letting me know!
I can definitely reproduce the issue and am presently bisecting the repository. I'll report back when I have something more definite.
I found a fix for it that also speeds up rendering: https://github.com/teorth/analysis/pull/352
